thread.title: BRIEF-Globo says postpones proposed issue of notes due to market conditions
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Globo says postpones proposed issue of notes due to market conditions | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Globo says postpones proposed issue of notes due to market conditions
text:
Oct 21 Globo Plc :
* Has postponed proposed issue of senior secured high yield notes due to market conditions
* Without financing scale deals will be smaller than previously thought, but company will continue to explore major acquisition opportunities Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136)
